title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a pan, sauté pancetta or bacon until crispy. Add garlic if using.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat, stir in the egg and cheese mixture, and toss until creamy.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, paprika, and salt for 1 hour.
Grill or sauté the chicken until cooked through and set aside.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, then stir in tomato puree.
Simmer for 5 minutes, add cream, and mix well.
Add the cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry over high heat until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Serve hot as a side or over rice/noodles.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles.
instructions: Dust beef slices with flour and season with salt and pepper.
In a pan, melt butter and sear the beef until browned. Remove and set aside.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in the same pan until softened.
Add beef stock and simmer for 5 minutes.
Return the beef to the pan and stir in sour cream.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve over cooked egg noodles.

title: Margarita Pizza
summary: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C (480°F).
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough.
Top with sliced mozzarella and fresh tomatoes.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden.
Add fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil before serving.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and white wine, served over pasta.
ingredients: Salt and red pepper flakes to taste
instructions: Cook pasta in salted water and set aside.
Heat olive oil and butter in a pan.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink on both sides.
Pour in white wine, simmer for 3-4 minutes, and toss with pasta.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.
instructions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and onion in a large bowl.
Add feta cheese cubes on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper.
Toss gently and serve chilled.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich and gooey chocolate cake with a molten center, perfect for dessert.
ingredients: Butter and cocoa powder for greasing
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F).
Melt chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl.
Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until light and fluffy.
Fold in melted chocolate mixture and sifted flour.
Grease ramekins with butter and dust with cocoa powder.
Fill ramekins with batter and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream or whipped cream.
